title: Frequency-domain approach to self-force in hyperbolic scattering
excerpt: In this paper we develop a frequency-domain code to calculate the scalar-field self-force along hyperbolic orbits in the Schwarzschild spacetime. Chosen as an Editors' Selection in Physical Review D.
citation: C. Whittall and L. Barack, "Frequency-domain approach to self-force in hyperbolic scattering", Phys. Rev. D 108, 064017 (2023), arXiv:2305.09724
